biotools.summary:
Deciphering active prophages from metagenomes.

PropagAtE (Prophage Activity Estimator) uses genomic coordinates of integrated prophage sequences and short sequencing reads to estimate if a given prophage was in the lysogenic (dormant) or lytic (active) stage of infection.

bioschemas.name: PropagAtE
